sys_ws_operation.name: Get script include

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Get script include</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var grSI = new GlideRecord('sys_script_include');
    if (grSI.get(request.queryParams.script_inc_id.toString())) {
        return grSI.getValue('script');
    }
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_13258_applicat_0/app_explorer/get_script_include</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/get_script_include</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-07 06:22:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>2a2b177647c17110274adeae536d434d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get script include</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Application Explorer" source="x_13258_applicat_0">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Application Explorer">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_2a2b177647c17110274adeae536d434d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-11-15 15:28:52</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="App Explorer">1b3df67f071321102b80fe4f7c1ed00e</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
